actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal LIFO recapture in the case of certain corporate liquidations.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the requirement, with respect to liquidation plans adopted after December 31, 1981, that a corporation inventorying goods under the last-in, first-out (LIFO) method of accounting treat the LIFO recapture amount with respect to distributed inventory assets as ordinary income.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal LIFO recapture in the case of certain corporate liquidations.
